Reference

All functions

clean() clean_logical() clean_factor() clean_numeric() clean_double() clean_integer() clean_character() clean_currency() clean_percentage() clean_Date() clean_POSIXct()

Clean column data to a class

Transform to currency

format_datetime()

Readable date format to POSIX

format_names()

Format names and values

format_p_value()

Format p values (APA guideline)

freq() is.freq() top_freq() header() print(<freq>)

Frequency table

na_replace()

Replace NA values

as.percentage() is.percentage() print(<percentage>) format(<percentage>) percentage()

Transform to percentage

rdate()

Generate random dates

regex_true() regex_false()

Regular expressions for TRUE and FALSE

unclean

Example data that is not clean
